headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist and 1 to Avoid
summary: A food company is finding it tough to generate earnings growth.  The shift in revenue from products to services is leading to margin expansion at Apple.  The interesting thing about this list is that the two buys, Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) and Pool Corp. (NASDAQ: POOL), have markedly higher valuations than the sell, Kraft Heinz (NASDAQ: KHC).
